text: Musharraf Karim (9 January 1946 â€“ 11 January 2020) was a Bangladeshi writer and journalist. He was honored with the Bangla Academy Literary Award in 2003. He was a fellow of Bangla Academy. Karim was born in Mymensingh. Khan was the news editor of Daily Dinkal. He was a permanent member of the Jatiya Press Club. Khan died on 11 January 2020 at a private hospital in Mymensingh at the age of 74. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Bangladeshi journalists Category:Editors
title: Musharraf Karim
